biography.bio: Born on 26 May 1923 in Wuppertal, he served with the Nazi German Waffen-SS in World War II. After attending acting lessons at the theater in Stendal, where he also made his stage debut, he performed on several important stages in Germany, but became widely popular as cinema and television actor in the late 1950s and 1960s, probably best known as gentleman gangster in The Great British Train Robbery (1966). Nevertheless, the role of his role was the character of "Stephan Derrick", a Munich Chief Inspector, who became a cult figure all over the world. He played the role from 1974 to 1998 and received several awards such as the Golden Camera, Bambi and the Italian Telegatto.
biography.name: Horst Tappert

biography.bio: Walo Lüönd was born on April 13, 1927 in Zug, Switzerland. He was an actor, known for The Swissmakers (1978), The Inventor (1981) and Escape to Paradise (2001). He was married to Eva-Maria Bendig. He died on June 17, 2012 in Locarno, Switzerland.
biography.name: Walo Lüönd

biography.bio: Lucie Mannheim was born on April 30, 1899 in Berlin, Germany. She was an actress and writer, known for The 39 Steps (1935), Bunny Lake Is Missing (1965) and Gerechtigkeit in Worowogorsk (1964). She was married to Marius Goring. She died on July 18, 1976 in Braunlage, Lower Saxony, Germany.
biography.name: Lucie Mannheim

biography.placeOfBirth: Breslau, Silesia, Germany [now Wroclaw, Dolnoslaskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Walter Jokisch was born on December 9, 1914 in Breslau, Silesia, Germany. He was an actor, known for Ich fahre Patschold (1964), Campingplatz (1964) and Der Hausfreund (1969). He was married to Grete Weil Jockisch and Lilo Weinsheimer. He died on February 23, 1984 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Walter Jokisch

biography.bio: Isolde Bräuner is an actress, known for Königinnen von Frankreich (1961), Peter Pan (1962) and Straße der Gerechten (1959).
biography.name: Isolde Bräuner

biography.bio: Frank Glaubrecht was born on July 15, 1943 in Berlin, Germany. He is known for his work on The Bridge (1959), Berliner Antigone (1968) and Die Bräute meiner Söhne (1965).
biography.name: Frank Glaubrecht

biography.bio: Horst Sachtleben was born on September 24, 1930 in Berlin, Germany. He is an actor, known for Um Himmels Willen (2002), Beyond Silence (1996) and Über den Tag hinaus (2015).
biography.name: Horst Sachtleben

biography.bio: Antje Hagen was born on August 10, 1938 in Pethau, Germany. She is known for her work on Le Tourbillon de l'amour (2005), Das Fräulein (1967) and Alle Jahre wieder: Die Familie Semmeling (1976). She was previously married to Günter Jendrich.
biography.name: Antje Hagen

biography.bio: Michael von Aster is an actor, known for Das Gespenst von Canterville (1965) and Der Kinderdieb (1966).
biography.name: Michael von Aster

biography.bio: Anna Paloff is an actress, known for Der Kinderdieb (1966) and Frühlings Erwachen (1966).
biography.name: Anna Paloff

biography.bio: Horst Breiter was born in 1935. He was an actor, known for Neues vom Süderhof (1991), Aus dem Alltag in der DDR - Zweiter Versuch einer Rekonstruktion nach Berichten und Dialogen (1970) and Der Kinderdieb (1966). He died in 2012.
biography.name: Horst Breiter

biography.bio: Hans-Rolf Radula is an actor, known for Die Dubrow Krise (1969), Jugend einer Studienrätin (1972) and Schwarze Vögel (1966).
biography.name: Hans-Rolf Radula
